item.description: If there is interest, I am going to book either 1 or 2 t times for Granite Links at their twilight rate of $65 w/cart. This is a gorgeous course (my favorite) and the 19th hole is very relaxing. If anyone is intersted, please rsvp as soon as possible as they require a credit card and I'm going to try to assign the T times as first come first serve as the second T time has less of a chance of completing all 18. Their first T time for this rate is actually at 4:20 but I'm hoping if we are all there and at the T by 4pm they'll let us out. As of right now, they are wide open from 3:00pm right through.
item.how_to_find_us: clubhouse or T at 3:50pm, driving range before that

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Granite Links, Sunday, 8/15
